00025 #ifndef _Image_H__
00026 #define _Image_H__
00027 
00028 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00029 
00030 #include "OgreString.h"
00031 #include "OgreDataChunk.h"
00032 
00033 namespace Ogre {
00034 
00046     class _OgreExport Image
00047     {
00048     public:
00051         enum PixelFormat
00052         {
00053             FMT_UNKNOWN = 0,
00054             FMT_ALPHA = 1,
00055             FMT_GREY = 2,
00056             FMT_GREY_ALPHA = 3,
00057             FMT_RGB = 4,
00058             FMT_RGB_ALPHA = 5
00059         };
00060     public:
00061 
00064         Image();
00067         Image( const Image &img );
00068 
00071         ~Image();
00072 
00075         Image & operator = ( const Image & img );
00076 
00091         Image & flipAroundY();
00092 
00112         Image & flipAroundX();
00113 
00120         static uchar PF2PS( PixelFormat eFormat )
00121         {
00122             uchar res = 0;
00123 
00124             if( eFormat & FMT_ALPHA )
00125             {
00126                 res += 1;
00127             }
00128             if( eFormat & FMT_RGB )
00129             {
00130                 res += 3;
00131             }
00132             else
00133             {
00134                 res += 1;
00135             }
00136 
00137             return res;
00138         }
00139 
00146         static uchar PF2BPP( PixelFormat fmt )
00147         {
00148             uchar res = 0;
00149 
00150             if( fmt & FMT_ALPHA )
00151                 res = 8;
00152 
00153             if( fmt & FMT_GREY )
00154                 res += 8;
00155             else
00156                 res += 24;
00157 
00158             return res;
00159         }
00160 
00163         static PixelFormat BPP2PF( uchar bpp )
00164         {
00165             if( bpp == 8 )
00166                 return FMT_GREY;
00167             if( bpp == 16 )
00168                 return FMT_GREY_ALPHA;
00169             if( bpp == 24 )
00170                 return FMT_RGB;
00171             if( bpp == 32 )
00172                 return FMT_RGB_ALPHA;
00173             return FMT_UNKNOWN;
00174         }
00175 
00178         static PixelFormat PS2PF( uchar bpp )
00179         {
00180             if( bpp == 1 )
00181                 return FMT_GREY;
00182             if( bpp == 2 )
00183                 return FMT_GREY_ALPHA;
00184             if( bpp == 3 )
00185                 return FMT_RGB;
00186             if( bpp == 4 )
00187                 return FMT_RGB_ALPHA;
00188             return FMT_UNKNOWN;
00189         }
00190 
00193         Image & loadRawData( 
00194             const DataChunk &pData, 
00195             ushort uWidth, ushort uHeight, 
00196             PixelFormat eFormat );
00197 
00210         Image & load( const String& strFileName );
00211 
00231         Image & load( const DataChunk& chunk, const String& type );
00232 
00235         uchar* getData(void);
00236 
00239         const uchar * getConstData() const;       
00240 
00243         size_t getSize() const;
00244 
00247         ushort getWidth(void) const;
00248 
00251         ushort getHeight(void) const;
00252 
00255         ushort getRowSpan(void) const;
00256 
00259         PixelFormat getFormat() const;
00260 
00261     private:
00262         // The width of the image in pixels
00263         ushort m_uWidth;
00264         // The height of the image in pixels
00265         ushort m_uHeight;
00266 
00267         // The pixel format of the image
00268         PixelFormat m_eFormat;
00269 
00270         // The number of bytes per pixel
00271         uchar m_ucPixelSize;
00272         uchar* m_pBuffer;
00273     };
00274 
00275 } // namespace

00277 #endif
